title: About Me
content:
about me

hey there! i'm ashutosh sharma, a computer science student at IIT Kharagpur (class of '27) with a passion for building innovative solutions to real-world problems.
when i'm not attending classes, i make music and work on side projects, or explore space missions.

currently

  • pursuing computer science & engineering at IIT Kharagpur
  • developing lang.as (name pending)
  • working on "mood classifier" - an application powered by essentia.js [released]
  • exploring AI/ML frontiers, crafting intelligent systems and experimenting with neural architectures
  • learning about space missions
  • and making music!

projects

  • lang.as - multi-language hybrid compiler with high-performance array operations
  • created poplyrics-1k - a custom dataset for training LLaMA 3.2-3b
  • developed ablespleeter - a max audio separation tool for ableton
  • built 4thcipher - result of my interest in cryptography and encryption techniques
  • and a lot more on my github

interests

  • programming & coding - executing my ideas and solutions into reality
  • music production - creating mainly pop and electronic tracks, my taste ranges from classical to the latest mainstream
  • ai/ml - learning about the latest in tech and implementing them in projects
  • space exploration - learning about satellites, with Voyager 1 & 2 and their computers being my initial inspiration into space

skills & tools

  • languages - python (primary), javascript/typescript, java/kotlin, c/c++
  • web development - react.js, next.js, django, node.js, postgresql, mongodb
  • machine learning - tensorflow, pytorch, pandas, numpy
  • development - vs code, neovim, git, docker, aws, vercel
  • creative - figma, adobe suite, fl studio, ableton live, logic pro

title: Links
content:
links

not super active on social media, but you can find me on these platforms:

  • twitter - occasional thoughts and updates (just made)
  • instagram - i share my art sometimes

music

  • soundcloud - where i will share my music

contact

  • email - best way to reach me

title: Reading
content:
reading

books i'm currently reading and some of my favorites.

currently reading

  • The Creative Act - Rick Rubin
  • Thinking in Systems - Donella Meadows

have read

  • Discrete and Combinatorial Mathematics - Ralph P. Grimaldi
  • Signal and System - Alan Oppenheim
  • Introduction to Algorithms - CLRS

favs

  • Think and Grow Rich - Napoleon Hill
  • The Creative Act - Rick Rubin
  • The Foundation - Isaac Asimov

title: Tech Stack
content:
tech stack

my digital toolkit - a curated collection of technologies i use to bring ideas to life.

core languages

  • python - my go-to language for ML/AI, data science, and backend magic
  • javascript/typescript - crafting modern web experiences and scalable applications
  • java/kotlin - building robust android apps and enterprise solutions
  • c/c++ - when performance is crucial and system-level control is needed

web ecosystem

  • react.js - building interactive user interfaces
  • next.js - for performance-optimized web applications
  • tailwind css - rapid, utility-first styling
  • chakra ui - better looks of components
  • django - robust python-based backend framework
  • node.js/express - for scalable, event-driven applications
  • postgresql - reliable relational data storage
  • mongodb - flexible document-based storage
  • redis - lightning-fast caching and real-time features

ai & machine learning

  • tensorflow - production-ready ML pipelines
  • pytorch - research and rapid prototyping
  • scikit-learn - classical ML algorithms
  • pandas & numpy - data manipulation wizardry
  • matplotlib & plotly - data visualization

development workflow

  • neovim - customized for maximum productivity
  • vs code - versatile modern development
  • jetbrains suite - language-specific powertools
  • git & github - version control and collaboration
  • docker - containerization and deployment
  • kubernetes - container orchestration
  • aws - comprehensive cloud infrastructure
  • vercel - frontend deployment and optimization
  • digital ocean - simple and reliable hosting

creative suite

  • figma - collaborative interface design
  • adobe suite - comprehensive creative tools
  • ableton live - music production and composition
  • logic pro - secondary for production and composition
  • fl studio - for drums and beat-making

space exploration

  • NASA's eyes - real-time space mission tracking
  • celestia - 3D space visualization
  • stellarium - detailed astronomical observations
